Key Match Events: Quinton de Kock blasted an 18-ball 47, with eight fours and a six
Richard Ngarava had to leave the field after taking a tumble
Wessly Madhevere and Milton Shumba hit six fours and a six in their time together
Temba Bavuma chose Wayne Parnell and Lungi Ngidi to bowl out early on
Kagiso Rabada took a one-handed catch to dismiss Sikandar Raza
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa have a 100% record against Zimbabwe in T20Is
Temba Bavuma is under pressure to perform
Mark Boucher's last tournament as head coach of South Africa
Faf du Plessis' autobiography will be released this week and may cause controversy
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa were denied a victory in their T20 World Cup opener due to rain
Points will be shared between South Africa and Zimbabwe
The one point South Africa have dropped could be crucial in the context of the tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain has affected several matches in the T20 World Cup so far
The ICC's playing conditions have allocated 1 hour and 25 minutes per innings and a total match time of 190 minutes
South Africa have some history with rain-affected games in the World Cup
Others: The teams will meet again in a virtual quarterfinal if South Africa lose to Pakistan on Thursday
